From: ragnus_@...

Thoughts of battle filled Ragnus's head as he raced towards the 
battlefield.  Reaching the edge of the combat, he transformed, still 
using his giant wings to hold his position. Taking out his two 
cylinders, he ignited them forming two eight foot long laser swords.

Looking down upon the carnage below he finds a lone 'bot, seemingly 
unconscious.

Perhaps a downed ally...

...perhaps a hostage.

He then went into a dive towards Perceptor.
